requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 12+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 12+
  • Processor: M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
